thread.title: Details of public funeral service for Kei'Mani Latigue announced
thread.title_full: Details of public funeral service for Kei'Mani Latigue announced

author: WTVG Staff
title: Details of public funeral service for Kei'Mani Latigue announced
text: TOLEDO, Ohio (WTVG) - Dale-Riggs Funeral Home announced the public memorial services for Kei’Mani Latigue on Wednesday in what is expected to be a massive showing.The public is invited to honor Kei’Mani with a walkthrough memorial at the West Toledo YMCA on Tremainsville Road on Friday. It’s scheduled from 4 p.m. to 7 p.m.A representative with the funeral home confirmed the authenticity of the event with 13 Action News.Those interested in leaving a message of support, sharing a memory of the young girl or sending flowers for the event can do so at her obituary page here . The obituary itself was not listed late Wednesday afternoon.It comes the day after a Lucas County judge determined Kei’Mani’s grandmother, Dorothy Latigue, has the legal right to plan the services for the 7th grader. 13 Action News coverage on the murder of Kei’Mani Latigue: Copyright 2025 WTVG. All rights reserved.
